content:
Figma is growing our team of passionate people on a mission to make design accessible to all. Born on the Web, Figma helps entire product teams brainstorm, design and build better products — from start to finish. Whether it’s consolidating tools, simplifying workflows, or collaborating across teams and time zones, Figma makes the design process faster, more efficient, and fun while keeping everyone on the same page. From great products to long-lasting companies, we believe that nothing great is made alone—come make with us!We’re looking for leaders across our engineering org who are excited about the challenges that come with rapid growth, and passionate about connecting people together through a positive and inclusive culture. As an Engineering Manager, you’ll work closely with your team, designers, PMs, and other engineering leaders to build and ship products and features that support our vision of helping teams and users collaborate. 
 
 
We're currently hiring engineering leaders in the following areas: 
 
 
Developer Experience
The Developer Experience team is responsible for the core build, test, and workflow systems used across Figma. Our mission is to make every engineer at the company happier and more productive! We’re improving our Bazel-based build system used by a variety of services, iterating on our cloud-based development environment, making our CI system faster & more reliable, and creating internal tools to make engineering workflows more efficient.
 
Our team is growing in order to ensure that engineering-wide productivity across Figma stays high as we scale. We’re looking for thoughtful leaders passionate about improving dev velocity and with experience leading teams focused on internal tools & systems.
 
 
Foundation
Server Platform is at the core of Figma’s infrastructure foundation! This area owns the foundational layer of infrastructure that underpins all other infrastructure and application services at Figma. The Foundation team under Server Platform is Infrastructure's infrastructure. This team enables the efficient operation and rapid development of reliable infrastructure at Figma through opinionated platforms. 
 
We are building the V2 of Infrastructure and setting key initiatives that will set the tone for infrastructure for the next half decade. We’re looking for thoughtful and technical leaders with experience leading teams focused on observability and traffic.
 
This is a full time role that can be held from one of our US hubs or remotely in the United States.
 
What you'll do at Figma:
Manage, support and grow a diverse team of engineers who design and build scalable products and features across Figma’s core design tool and FigJam.
Partner with product and engineering leadership to set strategy, priorities, and mission for teams and projects. 
Work closely with Product, Research, Design, Data and other engineering teams to define and build a best-in-class collaboration experiences. 
Establish trust within and across teams by creating accountability and a positive work environment in partnership with other leaders in the organization.
Grow your career in an engaged and creative engineering community.
We’d love to hear from you if you have:
3+ years of experience managing and leading high output engineering teams
Experience building and scaling distributed systems as a leader and/or as an individual contributor
Demonstrated leadership skills in building a high-performing and highly engaged engineering team. Proven track record of motivating, mentoring, and guiding senior engineers.
Proven track record of building, scaling, and shipping high-quality products in high growth environments
While it’s not required, it’s an added plus if you also have:
A commitment to build an inclusive and diverse culture
A passion and unwavering commitment to engineering excellence
A passion for deeply understanding the needs of our internal client teams and aligning roadmap to drive maximum business impact
 
At Figma, one of our values is Grow as you go. We believe in hiring smart, curious people who are excited to learn and develop their skills. If you’re excited about engineering leadership at Figma but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with the points outlined in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for one of our roles!
